pageHeader.subtitle: >- Original founding partner of a wine bar and gallery space devoted to electronic arts, robotics, new media, and video art.
pageHeader.description: >- RX Gallery Art and Technology Space in the SF Tenderloin.  RX Gallery was an art bar with a focus on art and technology-centered in the Tenderloin area of San Francisco. At the time, it was the pinnacle of art and technology in the region. We worked closely with artists and arts institutions that shared our interest in digital and electronic expression. The gallery operated from 2003 to 2008.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
